Docs.param: An array of arrays of bin-upper-bounds for each feature.
Anay array of arrays of effect sizes for each bin for each feature.
The intercept term for the model. Also referred to as the bias or the mean effect.
The number of features passed from the dataset. Used when the number of input features is different than the number of shape functions. Use default if all features have a shape function.

A map from the feature shape functions (as described by the binUpperBounds and BinEffects) to the input feature. Used when the number of input features is different than the number of shape functions. Use default if all features have a shape function.
